resources.title: Eliquis 360 Support Website
resources.description: The Eliquis HCP Website serves as a centralized hub for Healthcare Professionals to access comprehensive resources on ELIQUIS® (apixaban)
resources.longDescription: The Eliquis HCP Website serves as a centralized hub for Healthcare Professionals (HCPs) to access comprehensive resources on ELIQUIS® (apixaban), including its indications for reducing risks associated with stroke, deep vein thrombosis, and pulmonary embolism. The site also provides detailed efficacy and safety data, dosing guidelines, formulary lookup, and various professional and patient resources like co-pay & free trial offers, sample requests, and hospital discharge resources, enabling HCPs to better understand and discuss ELIQUIS® with their patients​1​
resources.author: E360 Support

resources.title: Online Support Provider Portal Website
resources.description: Initiate a Benefits Review, get PA and appeals assistance, and get help locating plan-specific forms and track status of active Tiering and Formulary exception requests
resources.longDescription: ELIQUIS 360 Support offers services and programs that provide help with prescription insurance benefits reviews and case management assistance to patients prescribed Eliquis.​
resources.author: E360 Support

resources.title: Mail Order Pharmacy
resources.description: Patient rebate online refers to a service provided by McKesson that allows patients to claim rebates or refunds for medical expenses such as mail order pharmacy
resources.longDescription: For patients using mail order or any non-participating retail pharmacy, please call McKesson at 1-866-279-4730 to request a patient rebate form, or go to patientrebateonline.com to download a form and follow the rebate program steps.​​
resources.author: E360 Support

resources.title: Request Samples
resources.description: Samples of ELIQUIS 2.5 mg and 5 mg tablets are available for eligible prescribers.
resources.longDescription: Samples of ELIQUIS 2.5 mg and 5 mg tablets are available for eligible prescribers. Call 1-855-ELIQUIS (354-7847) or click below to see if you are eligible to have samples delivered to your office.
resources.author: E360 Support

resources.title: Call 1-855-ELIQUIS (1-855-354-7847)
resources.description: 1-855-ELIQUIS can help patients and providers with common access issues.
resources.longDescription: 1-855-ELIQUIS can help patients and providers with common access issues. Callers will be routed to the appropriate support option depending on the issue.

resources.title: Eliquis 360 Patient Support Services FAQ
resources.description: This FAQ has been created to help ELIQUIS field representatives answer questions about the ELIQUIS 360 Patient Support Program that frequently arise during customer visits.
